import React from'react';import{useSudokuContext}from'../../context/SudokuContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";/**

 */export var GameSection=function GameSection(props){var rows=[0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8];var _useSudokuContext=useSudokuContext(),numberSelected=_useSudokuContext.numberSelected,gameArray=_useSudokuContext.gameArray,fastMode=_useSudokuContext.fastMode,cellSelected=_useSudokuContext.cellSelected,initArray=_useSudokuContext.initArray;/**

function _isCellRelatedToSelectedCell(row,column){if(cellSelected===row*9+column){return true;}var rowOfSelectedCell=Math.floor(cellSelected/9);var columnOfSelectedCell=cellSelected%9;if(rowOfSelectedCell===row||columnOfSelectedCell===column){return true;}return[[0,3,0,3],[0,3,3,6],[0,3,6,9],[3,6,0,3],[3,6,3,6],[3,6,6,9],[6,9,0,3],[6,9,3,6],[6,9,6,9]].some(function(array){if(rowOfSelectedCell>array[0]-1&&row>array[0]-1&&rowOfSelectedCell<array[1]&&row<array[1]&&columnOfSelectedCell>array[2]-1&&column>array[2]-1&&columnOfSelectedCell<array[3]&&column<array[3])return true;return false;});}/**

   * Returns the classes for a cell related to the selected cell.
   */function _selectedCell(indexOfArray,value,highlight){if(value!=='0'){if(initArray[indexOfArray]==='0'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"game__cell game__cell--userfilled game__cell--".concat(highlight,"selected"),onClick:function onClick(){return props.onClick(indexOfArray);},children:value},indexOfArray);}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"game__cell game__cell--filled game__cell--".concat(highlight,"selected"),onClick:function onClick(){return props.onClick(indexOfArray);},children:value},indexOfArray);}}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"game__cell game__cell--".concat(highlight,"selected"),onClick:function onClick(){return props.onClick(indexOfArray);},children:value},indexOfArray);}}/**
   * Returns the classes or a cell not related to the selected cell.
   */function _unselectedCell(indexOfArray,value){if(value!=='0'){if(initArray[indexOfArray]==='0'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"game__cell game__cell--userfilled",onClick:function onClick(){return props.onClick(indexOfArray);},children:value},indexOfArray);}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"game__cell game__cell--filled",onClick:function onClick(){return props.onClick(indexOfArray);},children:value},indexOfArray);}}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"game__cell",onClick:function onClick(){return props.onClick(indexOfArray);},children:value},indexOfArray);}}function _borderTop(index){if(index===3||index===6)return"2.5px solid black";};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"game",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{className:"game__board",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:rows.map(function(row){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{className:"game__row_".concat(row),style:{borderTop:"".concat(_borderTop(row))},children:rows.map(function(column){var indexOfArray=row*9+column;var value=gameArray[indexOfArray];if(cellSelected===indexOfArray){return _selectedCell(indexOfArray,value,'highlight');}if(fastMode){if(numberSelected!=='0'&&_isCellSameAsSelectedCell(row,column)){return _selectedCell(indexOfArray,value,'');}else{return _unselectedCell(indexOfArray,value);}}else{if(cellSelected!==-1&&_isCellSameAsSelectedCell(row,column)){return _selectedCell(indexOfArray,value,'');}else{return _unselectedCell(indexOfArray,value);}}})},row);})})})});};
